flaws.name: Archaic
flaws.desc: You are stuck in the past and cannot use modern technology

flaws.name: Living in the Past
flaws.desc: You have one or more outdated convictions.

advantages.name: Bond Resistance
advantages.desc: Its easier for you to resist against the effects of a Blood Bond.

advantages.name: Short Bond
advantages.desc: The Bond decays quicker for you.

flaws.name: Bondslave
flaws.desc: You bond at the first drink of Vitae.

flaws.name: Bond Junkie
flaws.desc: The Bond feels sweeter to you, and its harder for you to resist its effects.

flaws.name: Long Bond
flaws.desc: The Bond takes more time to decay.

advantages.name: Blood Hound
advantages.desc: You can smell the resonance on your prey without tasting it.

advantages.name: Iron Gullet
advantages.desc: You can feed from rancid, bagged and processed blood.

flaws.name: Farmer
flaws.desc: You feed exclusively from animals.

flaws.name: Organovore
flaws.desc: You slake hunger only from eating human flesh.

flaws.name: Methuselah's Thirst
flaws.desc: Your hunger can only be fully slaked by the blood of supernatural creatures.

advantages.name: Blood Empathy
advantages.desc: You share a closer bond to your domitor than most ghouls, able to sense their emotional and psychological state.

advantages.name: Unseemly Aura
advantages.desc: You have the aura of a Kindred.

flaws.name: Crone's Curse
flaws.desc: When you partook of your domitor's vitae, you aged rapidly.

flaws.name: Distressing Fangs
flaws.desc: The Blood gave you sharpened teeth, which distresses mortals.

advantages.name: Language fluency
advantages.desc: You speak, read and write another language fluently.

flaws.name: Illiterate
flaws.desc: You cannot read or write.

advantages.name: Stunning
advantages.desc: You are considered exceptionally good-looking, you turn heads everywhere you go.

flaws.name: Repulsive
flaws.desc: Your appearance is exceptionally horrifying.

flaws.name: Ugly
flaws.desc: You aren't very good-looking.

advantages.name: Eat food
advantages.desc: You can eat food, though it provides no nourishment and must be expelled before daysleep.

flaws.name: Stake Bait
flaws.desc: Being staked brings final death to the vampire

flaws.name: Folkloric Bane
flaws.desc: You take aggravated damage from one folkloric bane, like ultraviolet light, silver or holy water.

flaws.name: Folkloric Block
flaws.desc: You must recoil or spend a willpower when faced with one Folkloric Block, like white animals, running water, garlic, etc.

flaws.name: Stigmata
flaws.desc: You bleed from your hands, feet and forehead when your hunger becomes intense.

flaws.name: Living on the Edge
flaws.desc: You suffer a compulsion to always partake of new experiences.

flaws.name: Weak-Willed
flaws.desc: Your will is weak and you struggle assert your own personality when confronted with the will of another.

advantages.name: High-Functioning Addict
advantages.desc: You gain a die to one category of pool whenever you drink from a mortal who is on your drug of choice.

flaws.name: Hopeless Addiction
flaws.desc: Lose 2 die from all pools if you feed from someone not on your drug of choice.

flaws.name: Addiction
flaws.desc: Lose 1 die from all pools if you feed from someone not on your drug of choice.
